title: Hannah Wilson // 188
description:
In April of 2015, a 22-year-old woman was just 2 weeks away from becoming an Indiana University graduate, when she disappeared after a night of celebrating. When her body was found in a field next to someone else’s cell phone, and intense investigation began where MUCH more disturbing evidence was uncovered. This is the story of Hannah Wilson.
BONUS EPISODES
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast

https://specials.idsnews.com/the-little-sister/
